channel.title: Inventory on Mobile Robot I/O
channel.description: Recent content in Inventory on Mobile Robot I/O

item.title: 7inch Touch Screen by Element 14
item.description: This 7 inch touch screen display attaches directly to a modern raspberry Pi (upto B+ 2017 module). Todo: verify whether, or not this display can be attached to a Raspberry Pi Zero or not.

item.title: rip4
item.description: This Raspberry Pi has the 7 inch touch display attached, it also acts as the base station for the robots.
